text: Ngo Dinh Diem or Ngô Đình Diệm (British Pathé – "New York Hails Vietnam's President Diem (1957)" or ; 3 January 1901 – 2 November 1963) was the first President of South Vietnam. Unlike most people in Vietnam, he was a Catholic. == Death == After he kept favoring people of his religion, he and his brother were arrested and killed on 2 November 1963 by the non-communist South Việtnamese army during the Buddhist crisis.
